contest-event.event-date:
June 27, 1903 D Grangetown Contest
Grangetown Contest 10 Test Piece Contest Grangetown Contest grangetown-contest
None
Scottish Memories
Grangetown, North Yorkshire 2nd and 3rd divided between South Bank and New Brancepeth. Prizes - 1st £7, 2nd £4, 3rd £2, 4th £1. March contest - 1st Guisborough Priory, 2nd Charlton's Star of Hope. Best cornet - Guisborough. Best euphonium - South Bank. Contest promoted by Cleveland Steelworks Band. 10 bands competed.
June 15, 2013, 8:04 a.m. July 24, 2016, 3:41 p.m.
1 Middlesbrough Trades Herbert Milburn
2 New Brancepeth William Holdsworth
2 South Bank Israel Almond
4 Charltons Star of Hope Charles Henry Kay
